rows.label: tlk00340108_msg0001
rows.name:
Maybe it's because everyone in the group
acknowledges your strength... but I can really
feel the motivation buzzing around here!

rows.label: tlk00340108_msg0002
rows.name:
Complete some more missions,
and we'll trust you with
another important job.

rows.label: tlk00340108_msg0003
rows.name:
Make sure you come back to the
village every now and then!
